name: Qt Modeling Language File
summary: Learn about .QML files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: QML files start with an import statement since they must import at least one imported library. Below is an example QML source code snippet:

Rectangle { width: 120; height: 160; resources: [ Component { id: contactDelegate Text { text: modelData.firstName + " " + modelData.lastName } } ] ListView { anchors.fill: parent model: contactModel delegate: contactDelegate } }

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
